metadata.title: CVE-2019-20503 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
usrsctp before 2019-12-20 has out-of-bounds reads insctp_load_addresses_from_init.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20503` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 74.0+build3-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

thunderbird - 1:68.6.0+build2-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:68.6.0+build2-0ubuntu1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:68.6.0+build2-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:68.6.0+build2-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:68.6.0+build2-0ubuntu1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:68.6.0+build2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libusrsctp package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
firefox package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '74.0+build3-0ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:68.6.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
